Name: Attacker-chan!
About the game: Take down the out-of-control mechs! Head for the enemy base while escaping from the satellite guns. Go Attacker-chan! Features 2.5D short roguelike action game. Enemy mechs and robots have a cute military sci-fi style. Two game modes: Normal mode with infinite respawns and Expert mode with no respawns. Play time is 30 minutes to 1 hour. Simple controls: Move / Jump / Melee attack / Shoot / Dash
